contents:
海報最下面的英文如果是我的話會這樣寫：

The Chinese Communist Party (CCP) wants to take away your innards. It wants to bulldozer your churches. It wants to take away your guns. It wants to install spyware on your phones and in your homes. It wants to put you in concentration camps like those in Xinjiang. It has bought off a great many of your politicians. It is coming to a town near you. Beware of be next.
